name: Plague-Purging Warfare
desc: If a character has 4 stack(s) or higher of Critical Boost at the start of their turn, their SPD increases by 24%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
enhanced_desc: If a character has 4 stack(s) or higher of Critical Boost at the start of their turn, their SPD increases by 36%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
